title.b203: Spiritual Songs From Cold Mountain Two-Part Choral Book

othertext.d104: The heartfelt authenticity of these Appalachian-based spiritual songs shines in this new mini-collection arranged by Tom Fettke. Featuring three songs from the award-winning film Cold Mountain, this collection contains singable settings of<i> Great High Mountain, Poor Wayfaring Stranger</i> and <i>I'm Going Home</i>, which offer a unique and transparent worship mood.   <br>Arranged by Tom Fettke<br>Praisesong/Hal Leonard
